description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) obtained a code signing certificate signed by Digicert for some of its malware.(Citation: DFIR Ryuk 2 Hour Speed Run November 2020)

external_references.source_name: DFIR Ryuk 2 Hour Speed Run November 2020
external_references.description: The DFIR Report. (2020, November 5). Ryuk Speed Run, 2 Hours to Ransom. Retrieved November 6, 2020.
